name: The Horror
description:
Made for the 'Praise the Sun' Game Jam

WASD/Arrow keys to Move, Space to Jump, Z to Attack, X to Block

Created by Chris Rice and Trevor Westphal

Special thanks to Amanda Chaney and Maya Gort for QA Testing, Feedback, and snacks

Music by Brother Android

Source: https://github.com/donutmonger/PraiseTheSun
